settings.heading: Material
settings.content:
Leather:

Our leather products are made using high quality ‘Grade A’ leather. This means it has the least amount of blemishes or marks and ages in the most beautiful manner.
Our leather is ethically sourced and is a By Product of the meat industry.

PU Leather:

  Our vegan products are made using high quality PU.

Fittings:

The hardware fittings are made in Zinc which has a water resistant, long lasting and lightweight quality.

Jewellery:

  Our jewellery is made in brass with 22K gold plating. They are lightweight, water resistant and long lasting. The posts in all our earrings are made in pure silver.

settings.heading: Shipping
settings.content:
This product is ready to ship and is usually dispatched within 2-3 working days (Monday-friday).

After dispatching, prepaid orders take 2-7 working days to get delivered depending on the pincode.  COD orders take 3-10 working days to get delivered depending on the pincode.

In case you need your order faster, feel free to contact us via mail or WhatsApp, and we’ll be happy to send your order on express.  

Express orders have to be prepaid and come at an extra charge of ₹150.

settings.heading: Exchange
settings.content:
We do not provide returns on our products once they have been dispatched.

 Incase of exchange, we are happy to do the same within 14 days of delivery if sent back in the original condition and packaging.  

Please contact us via mail or Whatsapp for the same.  Please note that exchanges are subject to availability.
